about_the_game:
COPPER transports you to a dystopic future. Play as the android Maria as you follow orders from your human owner, Robert. Discover the secrets of a long-lost expedition in search of a mythical bio-mechanical artifact. Go toe-to-toe with a rogue machine, in search of something more meaningful than trash-compacting.

KEY FEATURES:

STORY MODE - play through a small but impactful story about the meaning of consciousness and long-lost friendship. Dive into a dystopian world and discover the story of a lost mining expedition gone wrong. Consider the true meaning of a living being and how far you would go to quench grief.

ENDLESS MODE - Perfect your skills and experience new challenges in this randomized competitive mode. Gain modifiers that can completely change the course of gameplay for both you and your opponent. Manage resources and decide what modifications you can live with. Make hard decisions as you try to reach the highest round possible!

GRAPHICS - Fight through a retro-style pixelized environment. With both creepy urban and natural environments, the world is tightly designed and intricate in its details.

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Graphics: AMD FX 6000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: COPPER brings you to a dystopian, industrial world. With tight third-person shooting controls and demanding 3D Bullet Hell mechanics. Push your reflexes and spacial awareness to the limit as you face a rogue machine in the heart of a long lost cave.
